name: AvatarSettingsButton
author: Neodymium
description: Moves the User Settings button to left clicking on the user avatar, with the status picker and context menu still available on configurable actions.

changelog.title: Improved
items: AvatarSettingsButton no longer depends on ZeresPluginLibrary for functionality!

changelog.title: Fixed
items: Fixed right click action activating twice (for whatever reason...).
